name: Forceful Push
prereq: Spell Trickster Dedication; Ability To Cast Mage Hand
summary: When you cast mage hand, you can modify it to shove a creature.
description:
When you cast mage hand, you can modify its target to be 1 creature. If you do, replace its standard effects with the following: You push your foe telekinetically. Make a spell attack roll against the target's Fortitude DC. On a success, you push the target 5 feet away from you. On a critical success, you push the target 10 feet away from you.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Attack: An ability with this trait involves an attack. For each attack you make beyond the first on your turn, you take a multiple attack penalty.
